title: How to add the letters of the alphabet to a word - Quora

response.answer_text: What are you talking about?! You mean like “car”, and add “toon” to get “cartoon”? Or “war”, and add “fare” to get “warfare”? Your question doesn’t really make a lot of sense.

It depends on the direction of writing. If the language is written left to right, you add alphabetic letters at the right end. If the language is written right to left, additional letters are added at the left end.
